description: conda - binary package and environment manager.

root.name: content-trust
tip: Signing and verification tools for Conda.

root.name: create
tip: Create a new conda environment from a list of specified packages.

root.name: deactivate
tip: Deactivate the current active conda environment.

root.name: doctor
tip: Display a health report for your environment.

root.name: info
tip: Display information about current conda install.

root.name: install
tip: Install a list of packages into a specified conda environment.

root.name: list
tip: List installed packages in a conda environment.

root.name: remove
tip: Uninstall/Remove a list of packages from a specified conda environment.

root.name: run
tip: Run an executable in a conda environment.

root.name: search
tip: Search for packages and display associated information using the MatchSpec format.

root.name: update
tip: Update conda packages to the latest compatible version.

options.name: --version
tip: Show the conda version number and exit.

common_options.name: --no-plugins
tip: Disable all plugins that are not built into conda.

common_options.name: --verbose
tip: Can be used multiple times. Once for detailed output, twice for INFO logging, thrice for DEBUG logging, four times for TRACE logging.
